alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 10:50AM MST until December 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of moderate to heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations between 12 and 18 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...In Montana, Pryor/Northern Bighorn Mountains. In Wyoming, Northeast Bighorn Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Visibilities may drop below 1/4 mile due to falling and blowing snow. The hazardous conditions will impact backcountry recreation and travel over US Highway 14.
info.instruction: Persons should consider delaying travel if possible. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.
